pageContent: Background: Being in a supportive relationship may have improved the health-related quality of life (HRQOL) of men with prostate cancer, if the support was strong and positive. In the current study, the authors sought to examine the impact of partnership status on the mental health of men treated for localized prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Metastases-free survival rate in non-metastatic castration-resistant prostate cancer: Now living on its own!
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/30846288/
